first_para: Mark "Bez" Berry (born 18 April 1964) is an English dancer, percussionist, author and media personality. He is a member of the bands Happy Mondays and Black Grape.

full.extract:
Mark "Bez" Berry (born 18 April 1964) is an English dancer, percussionist, author and media personality. He is a member of the bands Happy Mondays and Black Grape.
^ Researcha
full.title: Bez (dancer)
